person.about:
I'm a software developer specialised in multimedia design and Mobile App Development (iOS).

With over 10 years of experience, I have created software for different companies like: EA, McDonald’s Netherlands, DDB Tribal, Medtronic, KPN, KRO, Sanoma and many others.
When working on these projects I had different roles ranging from Game Designer, Mobile App Developer, Consultant and Team Lead.

portfolio.description: Helped RTL Nederland with a rewrite of the RTLZ app, the RTLZ app is a popular business news app with over 100k users.

The Easygrow app is an product which allows users to monitor their crops in their greenhouse or farm. During this project I helped out with the development and guided an intern with developing the app

portfolio.role: Lead Developer, Consultant, iOS Developer, Android Developer
portfolio.description: I helped with the development of the McDonald's app, during this project I helped out with software architecture, guided a team and assisted with iOS Development and Android Development
portfolio.technology: iOS SDK, Android SDK, IoT / Beacons

portfolio.description: During this project, the Dutch government wanted to promote the dangers of using a smartphone when cycling towards children. The Fietsmodus app encouraged children not to use their phone when on a bike.
